subsc: General industry and trade sector,Compulsory pension and unemployment insurance,General public administration sector,Postal services,Telecommunications
trustfund:
TF027832-POSTAL SERVICE SECTOR TRUST
            FUND - DEUTSCHE POST/WORLD BANK PARTNERSHIP,TF025641-PHRD-PRIVATE INVESTMENT PROMOTION

abstracts.cdata!:
The Private Investment Promotion Project
            for Senegal's development objective is to create the
            conditions to stimulate a sustained increase in private
            investment through an improved investment climate, greater
            private participation in economic activities, and policy and
            sector reform. The project is expected to make important
            incremental contributions towards Senegal attaining the 8
            percent GDP growth called for in the Government's
            poverty alleviation program. The project will support these
            initiatives through interrelated actions aimed at
            stimulating private investment, and consist of four mutually
            reinforced components: 1) improving the investment
            environment by facilitating the policy, legal and regulatory
            interface between the public and private sectors; 2)
            facilitating private participation and enhancing
            competitiveness; 3) stimulating sector investment and
            implementing policy reforms; and 4) supporting
            implementation and capacity building. The project will
            finance consulting services, studies, goods, computers and
            equipment, vehicles, training and minor civil works repairs,
            and operating costs.
